summary: Queen is a famous British rock band formed in 1970 by Freddie Mercury, Brian May, and Roger Taylor. They made many different types of rock music and became very popular. The band's name came from Mercury. They had big hits like "Bohemian Rhapsody," "We Will Rock You," and "We Are the Champions." Queen performed at the famous Live Aid concert in 1985. Freddie Mercury died in 1991, but the band's music is still loved worldwide. They've sold over 250 million records and won many awards.
title: Queen (band)
